entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • jit/performance/codequality/benchmarksgame/k-nucleotide/k-nucleotide-9/k-nucleotide-9.sh #67675
  • Native PGO: more targets #67671
  • OSR variants may not report pinned locals as pinned #67668
    7.0.0
  • Tweak profiler error messages to remove mention of COM #67664
    7.0.0
  • Discussion: Deterministic MVIDs for assemblies referencing System.Private.CoreLib across different architectures #67660
    7.0.0
  • Allow Background GC Thread Affinization #67653
  • Build: runtime checked build fails package creation #67646
  • Add header `Request-Context` to class Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers.HeaderNames #67645
  • Bitmap create new size as white image #67643
  • Make it possible to start a process suspended, and later resume it. #67642
  • Microsoft.Extensions.***.Abstractions nuget package/metapackage for use in class library #67637
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization not Deserialize inheritance class #67641
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.InstanceDataTests.InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo #67634
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected #67633
  • CrossDac build is failing in internal build #67632
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/PGO/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2.sh #67631
  • Contract violation in GC Profiler test #67630

Closed

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.CompareRequest fails on Linux when invoked with string attribute value #66243
    7.0.0
  • Build failure: jit/CMakeFiles/clrjit.dir/cmake_pch.cxx.obj #67672
  • GetOrCreate is not atomic which is a serious issue for a cache ( eg poor perf and memory issues) #36499
    Future
  • Environment Variables not in IConfiguration #67434
  • Updating to latest VS `17.1.1` and SDK `6.0.201` breaks web application builder #66383
    7.0.0
  • Rolling build test failure: JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86.Avx1 #67655
  • Allow access to child providers in ChainedConfigurationProvider #44486
    7.0.0
  • Aplication not found WindowsDesktop. @area-Host #67580
  • GetOrCreateExclusive() and GetOrCreateExclusiveAsync(): Exclusive versions of GetOrCreate() and GetOrCreateAsync() #36500
    Future
  • Encode UIntPtr length #67649
  • Rolling build failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.DefaultsToOffOutsideOfService #67625
  • Improve single-range IgnoreCase codegen for RegexCompiler / source generator #62647
    7.0.0
  • Determine if there are further sets to special-case in RegexCompiler / source generator #67056
    7.0.0
  • [release/preview3] Test failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStreamReadTests.TestAsyncErrorStream_SynchronizingObject #67549
  • QUIC: support CipherSuitesPolicy #55378
    7.0.0
  • Regex NonBacktracking lazy loops with IgnoreCase, and repeaters aren't as lazy as they should be #63395
    7.0.0
  • Regex isn't factoring target culture into lowercasing of ranges #36147
    Future
  • [Perf] Regression in Perf_Regex.Uri_IsNotMatch(IgnoreCase, Compiled) #61786
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #61972
    7.0.0
  • Overhaul Regex's handling of RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #61048
    7.0.0
  • Regex is incorrectly handling casing of some ranges #36149
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #60293
    7.0.0
  • HttpWebRequest seems to never cache a HttpClient #67629
  • Allow changing the newline sequence for indenting using Utf8JsonWriter #54715
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Refactor CharSetSolver and friends to avoid unbounded caching #67673
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix UB in CreateConstVector (strict alignment) #67669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update xharness to latest version #67667
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Various fixes for merged test runners on Mono #67665
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][interp] Fix corruption of the LMF chain #67663
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • S.S.C.Cose: Remove ECDsa and RSA overloads in favor of AsymmetricAlgorithm #67661
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Disable System.Security.Cryptography tests on x64 and x86 Emulators #67654
  • [runtime] copy updated byref nullables after invoke #67652
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix exception thrown from MsQuicStream writes when connection is aborted by peer. #67651
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Delete dead code #67648
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Only add placeholder pkg file if folder is empty #67647
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Add JitDump output for calls to recordRelocation #67639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Fix for the elusive suspension hang on Win7 WOW64 #67628
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • System.Runtime no longer needs to enable preview features #67162
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Enable MSVC standard conformance for JIT sources (#67608)" #67674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add libssl3 dependency to Debian DEPS package #67658
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Pin Roslyn version for generators in .NET 7 ref pack #67599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable HandleCollectionsAsync for OSX x64 #67662
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Allow access to child providers in ChainedConfigurationProvider #67610
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Enable MSVC standard conformance for JIT sources #67608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm 9.x, the 11.x support is stable … #67277
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] improve SslStream tests on server 2022 #67240
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    api-approved, area-Meta
  • Disable System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteAsync_LocalAbort_Throws #67638
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Change Regex UnicodeCategoryRanges to use spans #67576
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • log entire content to see which assertion fails #67586
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement
  • Add CipherSuitesPolicy support for MsQuic #67239
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Re-enable a few Regex source generator tests #67585
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use ComSmartPtr in tests #67584
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.5 #67615
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Manually update C# compiler version to a more recent preview #67440
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66870
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.5
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [WIP][Mono]Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Fix remote unwinding on MacOS Monterey (12) #67602
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Fix unsupported type detection when serializing polymorphic System.Type instances #67618
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Split Reflection and SourceGen TypeInfos #67526
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    community-contribution
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, tenet-performance, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.5
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.ClientSettingsReceived_Success test #67418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Reenable ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #67535
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • [release/6.0] Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67438
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.5
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #67621
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Aot annotation on System.Text.Json #67582
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet 6] `dotnet test` does not allow passing `--arch` and `--results-directory` together #24728

Closed

  • dotnet restore --no-dependencies is loading asset files from upstream project references in the latest .Net 6 preview #20556

PullRequests

Updated

  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24684
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1702368 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Dictionary pattern #2934
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #5988

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Label statements #5470
    Any Time
  • Champion: Readonly members on structs (16.3, Core 3) #1710

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix date of LDM notes for March 23rd, 2022. #5990

Updated

  • Support for ref struct as generic arguments #5689

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking change in overload resolution around string literals #60612
  • Disallow interfaces with abstract statics as type arguments #60606
  • [PDB][EE] Return Offset in Async Method should not be hidden #60602
  • [LSP] Completion/resolve computes text changes agains incorrect snapshot #60598
    17.3

Closed

  • Missing space between "internal" access modifier and "class" keyword when creating a new C# class when using File Scoped Namespaces as a VS default. #60345
  • IDE0005 reports Deconstruct method's namespace as not necessary #60594
  • Odd behaviour with async method declaration: bad colorization #60339
    17.3
  • Missing "variable is assigned but its value is never used" warning for assignment utilizing UTF8 String Literal #60319
    C# 11.0
  • Dotnet build fails for Windows arm64 #42393
  • #error emitted by code generators isn't shown #60447
  • IDE0062 code fix (local function can be static) removes "unsafe" keyword #59286
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Use ExpeditedDelay in with our features that pause while non-visible #60608
    Area-IDE
  • Pause computation of navbar items when a buffer is not visible #60607
    Area-IDE
  • Add ServiceHub helpers recommended in previous PR #60604
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'main-vs-deps' into 'features/semi-auto-props' #60603
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Grab bag of UTF8 string support in IDE features #60599
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1701033 #60591
    auto-merge
  • Change insertion branch #60610
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60611
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merges main-vs-deps to main #60605
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60609
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, Next
  • Add feature to convert from top-level-statements to Program.Main form #60383
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, Next
  • Colorize `async` as keyword in some cases #60558
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Ensure current OOP calls for the same solution-checksum can share the same OOP solution computation #60575
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Track "numeric IntPtr" feature #60579
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Check val escape for initializers of fields with ref-like type #60577
    Area-Compilers
  • Support built-in unsigned right shift operators. #60560
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Always use text edits in completion for correctness #60466
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash when combining reordered arguments with params array #60590
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • Move formatting analyzer to `Analyzers` layer #60549
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-needs-work
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Convert Visual Basic error list tests to the new framework #60588
    Area-IDE
  • Fix showing of generators/diagnostics under CPS analyzer nodes #60596
    Area-Analyzers
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add request duration to HostingEventSource #41073
  • Derived InputBase<T>, overridden methods not triggered #41072
  • Kestrel should throw BadHttpRequestException instead of InvalidOperationExceptions for absolute-form targets with non-ASCII characters #41071
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor Http client doesn't timeout #41069
  • Blazor WASM: PostAsJsonAsync missing response header content-disposition #41068
  • BL0007: Component parameters should be auto property ignores .editoronfig on linux #41067
  • Bitdefender Total Security detects a Trojan when viewing published Blazor WebAssembly as well as while publishing too #41063
  • MapFallback catch all requests to API controller when ConsumeAttribute added #41060

Closed

  • Exception thrown in RequestDelegateFactory.Create when handling null as a default value for nullable struct type #40774
    7.0-preview4
  • In ASP.NET Core, why are Session and User not accessible from services instead of members of HttpContext? #41065
  • SymmetricSecurityKey used in JwtBearer TokenValidationParameters does not implement RFC2104 key padding #41024
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option to SDK 6.0.300 #40944
    6.0.x
  • Accessing hosted Blazor WebAssembly solution in Chrome Android browser resulted in error #41064
  • Make Result types constructors public #40802
    7.0-preview4
  • Dependency Injection woes. #41061
  • Debugging Blazor WASM after publish #41033
  • Blazor wasm: Cannot wait on monitors on this runtime, when calling odata in OnInitializedAsync #41046
  • Multiple instantiation of my app when hosted on IIS: on AppPool Start, On Website Start and on Website Stop #40822
  • GetUserAsync takes very long #40989

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo (#39780)" #41070
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

Merged

  • Fix for issue 40774 RequestDelegateFactory null param default #41025
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Remove BuildX64 target #41040
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #40999
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.17
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option #40945
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, ask-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `e2c62a7` to `930ccc7` #40466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.34
  • Update branding to 2.1.34 #41055
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.34
  • [release/6.0] Add RID to targeting pack archive names #40731
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Uninstalling Hosting Bundle should uninstall chained runtimes #41057
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5

Updated

  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime, api-approved
  • Introduce the Results<TResult1, TResult2, TResultN> union types #40986
    api-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • feat (VSCode) : Add tasks to build current project #39221
    area-infrastructure, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure
  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Watson support for single-file apps #2438
    .NET 7.0
  • Update help text for dotnet-counters #382
    Future
  • Failed to find runtime module (coreclr.dll or clr.dll or libcoreclr.so), 0x80004002 #2821

Updated

  • dotnet-trace: unhandled exception results in a broken trace #2954
  • Diagnosing memory leaks with native leaks. #2906
    .NET 7.0
  • dotnet-trace prints "Unable to examine process." (when run in Kudu command line on App Service) #2781
    .NET 7.0
  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    .NET 7.0
  • Visual Studio stacks elide some CLR frames in mixed mode #2982
  • dotnet-stack should filter out its immediate parent `dotnet` process if any #2977

PullRequests

Created

  • [Infrastructure] Add devcontainer infra to diagnostics repo #2986
    Infrastructure

Merged

  • Disable OpenSuse and Fedora until we can add them back as AzDO agents #2983

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dependency injection breaks AppThemeBinding #5868
  • Creating android archive from VS 2022 17.2.0 preview 2.1 gives Error "Cannot create an android archive 'xxx' because the project does not have a package name". #5862
  • [Blazor][Wpf] Root namespace related issue #5861
  • In RC1, FontImageSource does not work on Image.Source #5859
  • Compile-time checked resources #5858
  • MAUI Blazor installer hangs #5857
  • Platform Specifics are not working #5856
    6.0.300-rc.2

Closed

  • [Bug] Crash trying to use RefreshView on Android #2889
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix RadioButton check into registrar for renderer registration #5323
    6.0.300
  • Crash during navigation with Navigation page #4306
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView's AllowSingleSignOnUsingOSPrimaryAccount defaults to false #5512
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Define a default namespace for .NET MAUI Blazor controls similar to that of Community Toolkit #4303
    6.0.300
  • Shell Flyout labels aren't visible #5766
  • CapturePhotoAsync returns null (Windows) #5849

PullRequests

Created

  • Close Web Message Channel Ports in Android Blazor Hybrid #5867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Updating SupportedOSPlatformVersion property in project templates #5866
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Remove iOS Compat ColorExtension ToUIColor overlap #5854
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/migration 🚚

Merged

  • Fix Android Radio Button #5773
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Make Microsoft.Maui.Platform.PlatformVersion internal #5860
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Less verbose Windows lifecycle logging #5865
    platform/windows 🪟, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • VersionTracking correctly handle version downgrades (e.g. via TestFlight) #5829
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Run all navigation through async update #5744
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Remove Default Storage Permission for Android SingleProject #5853
    area/templates 📄
  • [Android] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #5789
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Blazor] Initial support for configuring the underlying Web view settings #5802
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Controls] remove allow-listed Converters #5670
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add MAUI and WPF Blazor Hybrid XAML namespaces #5720
    area/Xaml </>, area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix some of the violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    area/Xaml </>, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Ensure GroupValueChangedMessage is received #5646
    area/controls 🎮
  • [C] remove Font usage from Controls #5664
    area/controls 🎮
  • BlazorWebView public API tracking #5672
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Geolocation iOS14+ Reduced Accuracy Support #5826
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Add a vscode workspace and some build tasks #5827
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add Essentials Maps TryOpen #5834
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible misuse of sqlite3_column_table_name et al #27776
  • Visual Studio could not scaffold Entity Framework controller #27774

Closed

  • Exceptions after upgrading from 6.0.1 to 6.0.3/6.0.2 #27600
    6.0.x
  • Inserting Integer Key WIth Default Value #27760
  • Why do you recommend for EF to create and maintain its own IServiceProvider for internal EF services? #27751
  • 1 : 1 From a Table to a DB View - Cannot delete the row from the Table #27754
  • Group By combined with Where Exists generates inefficient SQL #27773

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove quirks #27775

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27771
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27770
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27769
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0.x] Ignore a failing Cosmos test to unblock builds #27772
    6.0.5

Updated

  • Support value generation for converted types #27759
    providers-beware
